Name: HYPE
Changelog:
ADPTR Hype - Changelog

Version 1.5.0 (Nov 26, 2024)
- New Harmonic Modes : Sine Clean, Fold Clean, Fold Over
- New Multi-Band Gate which is part of the compressor section
Gate has 3 modes off / Classic / Parallel (closed == dry rather than silence)
Lock Gate allows user to stop gate settings changing when flicking through presets.
- New Max Gain feature to cap the amount of gain the Compressor section can apply.
- Stereo / Width Module improved with better differentiation of wet signal leading to better stereo coherence. (Menu contains a fallback to legacy behaviour)
- New, higher quality Linear Phase crossover.
- Per band Gain Metering in compressor section (showing gain reduction and gain increase)
- THD Monitoring in harmonics section.
- More Automatable Parameters
- More consistent UI styling and mouse over behaviour.

Version 1.0.1 (Apr 19, 2024)
- Soft Bypass: Improved functionality for in and out levels, also smoother audio during engagement.
- UI Enhancements:
- Added cross over type and Clip controls to the user interface.
- Corrected display issue where the bypass overlay did not show correctly when the plugin was opened in bypass mode.
- Stereo Module: Resolved an issue where bypassing could diminish sides signal, impacting null tests.
- Frequency Analyser: Fixed occasional graphic tearing.
- Presets: Expanded preset library.
- Some minor UI errata

Version 1.0.0 (Feb 29, 2024)
- Initial release

Name: SCULPT
Changelog:
ADPTR AUDIO Sculpt - Changelog

Version 1.3.0 (Feb 8, 2024)
- NEW High-Pass / Low-Shelf toggle added for side-chain EQ
- NEW External side-chain audition toggle button
- NEW Auto-gain begins analysis automatically when switched on
- NEW Numbers can be dragged up and down in EQ pop-out boxes
- CHANGE Auto-gain is now disabled when external side chain is activated
- CHANGE Mono side-chain enabled to allow external side-chaining in Pro Tools
- FIX: Fixed bug where an incorrect latency was occasionally reported wrongly in WaveLab
- Various stability / performance improvements

Version 1.2.0 (Mar 16, 2023)
- NEW Precision Mode with higher meter resolution
- NEW Master output meters have adjustable range
- NEW Mono (1 in 1 out) channel configuration support
- NEW Tone Sculpt smoothing param
- NEW More Plugin Themes
- NEW AAX Native Apple Silicon support
- Module controls are now hidden when mouse cursor is outside the plugin Window
- Fixed bug in FL Studio latency error when offline rendering

Version 1.1.2 (Aug 24, 2022)
- Native M1 builds for VST2, VST3 and AU mac formats
- New performance menu added, allowing enhanced customisation of latency vs performance (see hints / manual)
- Internal sound quality improvements on lower latency modes
- Many internal optimisations for lower CPU usage
- Option to disable OpenGL added to settings menu in Windows (not recommended, only for when you have issues with OpenGL)
- Hide module controls when mouse is over Tone Area for better visibility of History Graph
- Disable controls when greyed out to prevent confusion
- Extra-small (60%) UI size added
- Metering, Tonal Graph and History Graph parameters are no longer saved with Master Presets
- Highlight parent folder of currently selected preset when navigating preset menus
- Hard-enable Transient Module automatically when interacted with
- Fixed bug where non-realtime rendering in Wavelab 11 was creating incorrect/noisy results
- Fixed bug where transport bar visually flickered in some hosts
- Fixed bug where latency was incorrect when host-bypass engaged in some DAWs
- Fixed bug where Changes to declared plugin latency were picked up for VST2 in Cubase (Mac/Win)
- Minor UI tweaks
- Oversample / Latency Mode / External Sidechain parameters no longer saved with Master presets
- Audio Demo folder added to master presets
- Fixed crash in Adobe Audition 2020 on Plugin Open

Version 1.0.5 (Feb 17, 2022)
- Initial release

Name: Kirchhoff-EQ
Changelog:
Three Body Technology Kirchhoff-EQ - Changelog

Version 1.7.1 (Dec 2, 2024)
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where adjusting parameters in linear phase mode caused loud popping noises.
- Fixed a bug where enabling Lookahead could cause crashes in certain cases.
- Fixed a bug where the vertical axis displays incorrectly on the spectrum analyzer in certain cases.
- Avoided an issue where the menu bar could block the window after entering full-screen mode on certain Mac devices.
- Fixed a bug where dialog boxes displayed incorrectly in some cases.
- Fixed a bug where the About page displayed incorrectly under certain conditions.
Improvements:
- Left, Right, Mid, and Side can now be selected as the default stereo mode.
- The ‘alt’ key is now displayed as ‘option’ in the settings on Mac version.

Version 1.7.0 (Jul 9, 2024)
Optimizations:
- Improved performance on touchscreens.
- New vector font.
- New pitch display in spectrum grab mode.
- Default filter types created by dragging at low and high frequencies now can also be customized.
- Optimized Tilt's edit section.
- Optimized performances of some popup windows.
- Completely revised settings menu.
- New 'Factory Reset Default State' button in settings menu.
- 'Initialize' now renamed to more accurate 'Clear All Bands'; new 'Reset to Default' function.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed an issue that freezes the render thread in certain cases.
- Fixed the issue that corrupted default state file might disable the plugin.
- All knobs and sliders now respond to the 'reverse mouse wheel' setting.
- Operations on Lookahead switch, Output Gain knob and Output Pan knob now can be correctly undo/redo or saved between A/B switching.
- Fixed the audio glitch that might occur following adjustments on band's pan in non-minimum phase modes.
- Fixed the issue that when monitoring certain types of bands, the monitored frequency range won't change along with the Q value.
- Fixed the issue that in full screen mode, removing tracks or plugins in the DAW might cause a crash.
- Fixed multiple display issues in full screen mode.
- Fixed the issue that full screen mode won't be on top in certain DAW's.
- Fixed incorrect scales of menus and popup windows under certain display settings.
- Fixed incorrect mouse dragging behavior on knobs under certain screen resolutions.
- Fixed an issue that the actual cursor position might be inconsistent with the position the plugin responded to when used on multiple screens with different display scales.
- Fixed incorrect spectrum refresh rates in certain special cases.
- Fixed multiple issues under Rosetta translation environment on macOS.

Version 1.6.4 (Mar 28, 2023)
New Features
- Now AAX plugin is available for native Apple Silicon.
- Allow to customize spectrum refresh rate in Global tab of settings menu.
The available values are between 30FPS and the highest refresh rate of your monitor(s). Changes on this setting would affect Kirchhoff-EQ on all instances in real time.
- Added 7 preset themes.

Optimization
- Rebuilt OpenGL rendering scheme that improves software stability on integrated graphics cards.

Bug Fixes
- Now global scale applies to all menus.
- Now the user manual could be opened correctly through PA licensing toobar.
- Fixed unexpected refresh rate changes when making mouse operations on spectrum panel.

Version 1.6.2 (Mar 08, 2023)
Optimizations
- The inactive knobs of the current filter type are grayed out.
- Sharper Q value of monitoring.
- Slightly improved GUI rendering speed.
- Improved stability in native ARM64 Logic Pro.
- Show CPU type in About page to distinguish native/rosetta translated version.

Bug Fixes
- Fixed the issue that certain parameters does not respond to DAW's automation.
- Fixed occasional high CPU consumption in audio thread.
- Fixed incorrect panel backgrounds.
- Fixed the issue that manually typed output gain and pan values cannot be correctly applied.
- Fixed the issue that copied band cannot be correctly pasted on certain devices.
- Fixed the issue that minus values cannot be typed into certain text boxes.
- Fixed default path for background image customization on Mac.
- Fixed improper popup window in Ableton Live that causes missing plugin.
- Changing Q with mouse dragging now behaves the same with mouse wheel.

Version 1.6.0
- Initial PA Release

Name: Battalion
Changelog:
Unfiltered Audio Battalion - Changelog

Version 1.0.7 (Nov 4, 2024)
- Hotfix. Voice Presets created in V1.0.4 and earlier were not loading correctly in V1.0.5 and V1.0.6

Version 1.0.6 (Sep 17, 2024)
- Hotfix. Battalion was not resizing correctly in formats other than VST3.

Version 1.0.5 (Sep 11, 2024)
- Add NKS support.
- Add Scrapyard synth engine, a blend of FM and Modal.
- Add MiniGlitch and MegaGlitch distortion effects.
- Add Contrast distortion effect.
- Add Square distortion effect.
- Add Dropout distortion effect.
- Add MIDI note controls to start or stop playback.
- Add MIDI note controls to toggle Mute and Solo status.
- Add MIDI note controls to control randomization and performance.
- Add MIDI note controls to change presets.
- Add MIDI note controls to manually choke drum channels.
- The play/stop status is now saved with DAW projects.
- The reverb control no longer jumps unpredictably when clicked and behaves more like the other knobs.
- Fixed a bug where sampler controls were not updating with correct engine tooltips.
- Fixed a hard crash in Pro Tools when clicking a drop-down on the sequencer page.
- Added a "Show User Sample Folder" shortcut to the sample selection menu.
- Fixed a bug where "Free Run" LFOs weren't resetting when the DAW's transport was restarted.
- "Load Sample..." now remembers the last folder opened during a session.
- Significant optimizations to GUI rendering.
- Performance: removed unnecessary repaints on envelope visualizers, sample visualizer, and play button (50% CPU gain)
- Performance: fixed infinite loop bug in sample loader
- Performance: fixed bug causing some minimized states on interface to use +100% CPU

Version 1.0.4 (May 6, 2024)
- Fixed race condition crash when turning Performance Steps negative or other sequencer conditions leading to a undefined rotation
- Fixed lockup when randomizing presets rapidly
- Stop button works correctly again
- Performance controls don't affect label printing on sequencer page

Version 1.0.3 (Apr 16, 2024)
- Initial Release

Name: Trinity Shaper
Changelog:
Three-Body Technology Trinity Shaper - Changelog

Version 1.1.0 (Jan 17, 2025)
New Features:
- Added gain adjustment knobs for each band in multi-band mode.
- Added a button to toggle the processing order between Makeup and Limiter.
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where the monitoring status displayed incorrectly after reopening the window.
- Fixed a bug where dialog boxes displayed incorrectly in some cases.
- Fixed a bug where preset names and modification statuses were displayed incorrectly.
Improvements:
- A setting has been added for the side chain EQ that, when enabled, will display a parameter value monitor for the selected band, supporting drag-and-drop editing and double-click input editing.
- Added a status indicator to show when sidechain mode and sidechain EQ are active (displayed on the sidechain button).
- Improved visibility of frequency settings for bands in multi-band mode.
- The ‘alt’ key is now displayed as ‘option’ in the settings on Mac version.
- Added the ability to set background images in the theme settings.

Version 1.0.0 (Sep 12, 2024)
- Initial release

Name: Cenozoix Compressor
Changelog:
Three Body Technology Cenozoix Compressor - Changelog

Version 1.1.1 (Jan 17, 2025)
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where dialog boxes displayed incorrectly in some cases.
- Fixed a bug where preset names and modification statuses were displayed incorrectly.
Improvements:
- A setting has been added for the side chain EQ that, when enabled, will display a parameter value monitor for the selected band, supporting drag-and-drop editing and double-click input editing.
- Added a status indicator to show when sidechain mode and sidechain EQ are active (Displayed on the sidechain button).
- Added 3dB, 1dB and 0 dB options for the waveform display's maximum dB setting (in display panel).
- Added -6 dB and -3 dB options for the waveform display's minimum dB setting (in display panel).
- The ‘alt’ key is now displayed as ‘option’ in the settings on Mac version.
- Added the ability to set background images in the theme settings.

Version 1.1.0 (Apr 19, 2024)
- Implemented "Drive" modelling: Extra harmonic distortions for each of 24 vintage and modern compressor styles with adjustable drive levels. Enables you to mix and match a compressor style with a different drive style
- Implemented "Post-Makeup Dry Mix" that allows to mix dry and wet signals after makeup processing.
- Implemented compact mode with hidden waveform and threshold panels

Version 1.0.1 (Feb 21, 2024)
Bug Fixes
- Oversampling now works correctly. Fixed the issue that some internal DSP codes remain at the original sample rate instead of being initialized to a higher sample rate when oversampling is enabled, which may cause the missing low end.
- Fixed an issue with latency compensation which causes phase issues when mixing dry and wet signals.
- Undo in Logic now works correctly.
- Fixed the incorrect display of Hold parameter when reopening the GUI.
- Now knob fine tuning with Shift works correctly on macOS.
Optimizations
- New oversampling IR kernel that improves the sound quality while slightly increasing the latency.
- Now supports the gain reduction meter display in Studio One.

Version 1.0.0 (Feb 6, 2024)
- Initial Release

Name: EQ4
Changelog:
Maag EQ4 - Changelog

Version 1.16.1 (Aug 26, 2024)
- Fixed audio being muted in AAX DSP

Version 1.16.0 (Aug 15, 2024)
- Note: Session compatibility confirmed
- Added bx_toolbar including ABCD-Bank parameter
- Added scalable UI feature
- Improved GUI performance
- Updated GUI design
- Improved Level Trim control
- Added switchable "Black Edition" GUI design
- General : improved performance
- General : changed audio behavior for unlicensed plugins
- General : added usage data tracking
- General : deprecated macOS 11.0 (new minimum: 11.1)

Version 1.15.1 (Oct 9, 2023)
- General: fixed CPU spikes on Mac OS

Version 1.15.0 (Aug 15, 2023)
- General: added native Apple Silicon compatibility for AAX
- General: added macOS Ventura support
- General: improved plugin loading time in the DAW
- General: fixed issue causing Logic to crash when closing the plugin UI
- General: improved font drawing behavior

Version 1.14 (Mar 15, 2022)
- General: added native Apple Silicon compatibility for VST3, VST2 and AU
- General: added macOS Monterey support
- General: added Windows 11 and Windows 10 21H1 support
- General: discontinued Windows 7 support
- General: discontinued macOS 10.9 and 10.11 support
- General: fixed metering behavior in block sizes of 2048 samples and higher

Version 1.13 (Mar 22, 2021)
- General: Compatibility with Logic on Apple Silicon devices via the Rosetta-2 layer
- General: Fixed possible artefacts when freezing or bouncing tracks in Pro Tools
- General: Fixed automation highlighting disappearing in Studio One
- General: Improved license dialog visibility in dark mode
- Improved metering behavior

Version 1.12 (May 27, 2020)
- General: Qualified for use with the Windows 10 May 2020 Update
- General: VST3: Fixed potential hangs in a DAW upon loading
- General: Fixed logical issues in undo / redo behavior
- General: Fixed UI resizing issues in Ableton Live on Windows
- General: Fixed audio processing initialization issues on amp and delay products

Version 1.11 (Nov 06, 2019)
- General: Qualified for use with macOS 10.15 Catalina
- General: Qualified for use with Windows 10 November 2019 Update
- General: Fixed plugin validation in Logic under macOS Catalina
- General: Fixed preset name restore in Logic when reopening a session
- General: Fixed opening authorization dialog triggering automation
- General: Improved instantiation times for plugins
- General: Improved license functionality and branding for subscription
- General: Removed 32-bit support on macOS and Windows

Version 1.10 (Jul 10, 2019)
- General: macOS 10.14.5 Update compatibility
- General: Windows 10 1903 Update compatibility
- General: Fixed activation issue in Windows hosts set to non-English language (e.g. Cakewalk)
- General: AU: Fixed issue with increased CPU and memory on reopening UI
- General: VST3: Fixed issue with adapting to host knob mode, and now prioritizing linear
- General: VST3: Fixed issue with VST3 preset permissions
- General: VST3: Improved synchronization between parameter states and some UI functions, e.g. toolbar reset

Version 1.9 (Nov 16, 2018)
- General: macOS Mojave compatibility
- General: Windows October 2018 update compatibility
- General: adding Windows High DPI support for VST2/3 plugins
- General: Fixed potential crashes in Cubase and other VST2 / VST3 DAWs
- General: Fixed potential CPU spikes and audio dropouts
- General: Fixed rendering in Pro Tools on the start of a session
- General: Fixed missing presets in Wavelab and other VST3 DAWs
- General: Improving keyboard control, fixing issues with catched keys preventing it from passing through to DAW
- General: Fixed parallel use of host sessions (e.g. with Live)

Version 1.8 (May 24, 2018)
- General: Microsoft Windows Redstone 4 compatibility
- General: Added computer keyboard control for plugin parameters
- General: Fixed Mouse scroll wheel not working in Windows 8
- General: Fixed an issue where plugins will not validate or load after a certain amount of plugins have been loaded (Windows)
- General: Fixed visual GUI freezes when adjusting DAW parameters, meters, analyzers (Mac)
- General: Fixed possible issue with Pick Pack licenses
- General: Small licenser stability fix
- Added Pro Tools Multi-Channel support

Version 1.7 (Oct 23, 2017)
- General: Mac OS High Sierra compatibility
- General: Fixed possible crash on online activation (Mac OS High Sierra)
- General: Fixed Logic Pro X not validating AU plugins (Mac OS High Sierra)
- General: Fixed CPU spikes and crashes with Cubase (Windows)
- General: Fixed bug that could lead to "AAE -6 error" in ProTools (Windows)
- General: Fixed crash with FL Studio
- General: Fixed crash when cross-opening plugins in various hosts
- General: Fixed crash when using mixdown in Audition
- General: Fixed crash in Final Cut Pro
- General: Fixed delayed parameter handling and crackling issues in Cubase with VST3
- General: Fixed bug where plugin settings were not saved in Harrison Mixbus
- General: Fixed bug that led to AAE error -9317 in ProTools when instantiating plugin
- General: Fixed bug where plugins did not render properly when "x ray" option is enabled in Sonar
- General: Modifications to factory presets were lost when reopening session
- General: Fixed mouse wheel behaviour with second monitor setup (Windows)
- Some plugins: Value labels do not appear every time when clicking on parameter in UI
- General: Faster instantiation time for plugins (Windows)
- General: Adding support for automation highlighting in Presonus StudioOne
- Fixed bug that caused Waves LV1 Mixer to hang

Version 1.6.1 (Dec 20, 2016)

- General: Fixed automation issues in AU and AAX
- General: Fixed license dialog use of special characters
- General: Improved AU preset support
- General: Performance improvements
